## Public Constructors

### DiagnosticInfoGeneric() {#a500f30d852a904727f0dc586c76d7235}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::DiagnosticInfoGeneric::DiagnosticInfoGeneric (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp; MsgStr, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abfcab32516704f11d146c757f402ad5c">DiagnosticSeverity</a> Severity=<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abfcab32516704f11d146c757f402ad5caa73815097c71f15fe54ab447a7ff00ba">DS&#95;Error</a>)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
<code>MsgStr</code> is the message to be reported to the frontend.

This class does not copy <code>MsgStr</code>, therefore the reference must be valid for the whole life time of the Diagnostic.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h/#l00148">148</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h">DiagnosticInfo.h</a>.
